concept.title: Organizational Units
concept.shortdesc: Apply settings to groups of users or devices

conbody.p: Initially in your Google Admin console, all your users and devices are placed in a single organizational unit, called the top-level organizational unit. All settings you make in the Admin console apply to this top-level organizational unit and, therefore, to all users and devices in your account.

To apply different settings to some users or devices, place them in a child organizational unit, (for example, Finance, Human Resources) below the top level. Users or devices in organizational units get the settings that you apply to them. To keep a child organizational unit from inheriting its parentâ€™s settings, apply to the child any settings that are specific to it.
